snippet.title: Between the Worlds II: The Pyramid by Puppet Life. Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Between the Worlds II: The Pyramid by Puppet Life is not a regular seek&find game, and one has to love adventure games and think out of the box to accomplish certain tasks successfully.

[Kirland on BigFish Games]: Finished it. Very unique. Definitely had to dust off some of the grey cells. Good brain exercise. I really liked the clever puzzles. You don't often see great games like this that challenge the mind. Clever, Stimulating! This One Is A Winner!
